mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor; one of the two most established self-hosted repository managers alongside JFrog Artifactory, with stronger historical ties to the Java ecosystem

mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
mentionedBy.notes: Primary competitor and the other major player in artifact repository management. Nexus offered open source and commercial versions, with strong support for Maven repositories and growing support for other formats.

mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
mentionedBy.notes: Leading competitor; established self-hosted repository manager supporting wide range of package ecosystems with strong Java heritage
